name: Rudolf Joseph Lorenz Steiner
main_interests: Metaphysics, Epistemology, Philosophy of science, Esotericism, Christianity, Spiritual Science, Freemasonry
influences: Franz Brentano, Wilhelm Dilthey, Fichte, Hegel, Goethe, Schiller, Max Stirner, Schopenhauer, Eduard von Hartmann, Nietzsche, Helena Blavatsky
influenced: Owen Barfield, Josef Beuys, Wassily Kandinsky, Albert Schweitzer, Richard Tarnas
notable_ideas: Anthroposophy, Anthroposophical Medicine, Biodynamic Agriculture, Eurythmy, Spiritual Science, Waldorf Education
